the two figures of price index, came to be Rs.38.69%. The Court could grant increase or decrease to the maximum of 25% under Section 4 (3) of the Act which came to be 9.67%. On this basis the increase in the fair rent came to be Rs.7.54 (78/9.67x100). The CIVIL WRIT PETITION NO.1436 OF 1991 -4- fair rent, therefore, came to be Rs.78+7.54 = Rs.85.54. The round figure of fair rent, therefore, came to be Rs.86/- per month w.e.f. .01.1988 including house tax. The calculations were also depicted by the Counsel for the revision petitioner, in a separate chart, which are in consonance with the decision rendered by the Courts below. The Courts below, in my opinion, rightly calculated the fair rent, in accordance with the formula, referred to above,
